faq.title: Questions & Answers
faq.description: Everything you need to know about glmimage.net

items.question: How much does it cost to generate images?
items.answer: A comparison (4 models) costs 12 credits. Individual iterations cost 2-4 credits depending on the model. New users get 10 free credits to start.

items.question: Which AI models are available?
items.answer: We currently support Flux Pro (photorealistic), Flux Dev (balanced), Recraft (design-focused), and Ideogram (typography). More models coming soon.

items.question: Can I download the images I generate?
items.answer: Yes! All generated images are yours to download and use. No watermarks, full resolution, available instantly.

items.question: What happens after I select a direction?
items.answer: You enter iteration mode with your chosen model. Keep refining your prompt and generating until you achieve the perfect result.

items.question: Is there an API available?
items.answer: Not yet, but we're working on it. For now, use our web interface to generate and download images.

items.question: What image formats and sizes are supported?
items.answer: Images are generated at high resolution (typically 1024x1024 or similar) and can be downloaded as PNG files.
